title: ‘Athlete Weight Is Going to Increase’: Inside the Radical Theory That Could Tip the Scales on Pro Cycling
content:
Will 'bigger' become 'better'? Uno-X Mobility trainer Olav Bu puts new twist on the nutritional revolution with idea that key performance parameters increase at an outsize rate to bodymass.

Read the full article at ‘Athlete Weight Is Going to Increase’: Inside the Radical Theory That Could Tip the Scales on Pro Cycling on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
